title: Mortgage firm loanDepot cyberattack impacts IT systems, payment portal
description: U.S. mortgage lender loanDepot has suffered a cyberattack that caused the company to take IT systems offline, preventing online payments against loans. [...]

title: Stealthy AsyncRAT malware attacks targets US infrastructure for 11 months
description: A campaign delivering the AsyncRAT malware to select targets has been active for at least the past 11 months, using hundreds of unique loader samples and more than 100 domains. [...]

title: KyberSlash attacks put quantum encryption projects at risk
description: Multiple implementations of the Kyber key encapsulation mechanism for quantum-safe encryption, are vulnerable to a set of flaws collectively referred to as KyberSlash, which could allow the recovery of secret keys. [...]
